context: Analyze this seated twist pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Seated Spinal Twist (Ardha Matsyendrasana) Seated twist with one leg crossed over. Consider the Spinal mobility, digestive health, hip flexibility. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Seated twist with one leg crossed over
practitioner.primaryFocus: Spinal mobility, digestive health, hip flexibility

specificNeeds: Spinal mobility, digestive health, hip flexibility
